:list.description: For the configuration parameters of each item, see the description at the top, in the form of an array
:list.description_zh: 各项的配置参数，见顶部说明，数组形式

show.description: Whether or not to display the portlet

:v-model.description: The index value of the bidirectionally bound activation
:v-model.description_zh: 双向绑定的激活项的索引值

bg-color.description: The background color of the component

height.description: The height is arbitrary, and the value is rpx unit, which is not recommended
height.description_zh: 高度，单位任意，数值则为rpx单位，不建议修改

icon-size.description: The size of the non-central bump icon is arbitrary, and the value is rpx
icon-size.description_zh: 非中部凸起图标的大小，单位任意，数值则为rpx单位

mid-button-size.description: The size of the raised icon is arbitrary, and the value is rpx
mid-button-size.description_zh: 凸起的图标的大小，单位任意，数值则为rpx单位

active-color.description: The color of the text and font icons when they are active
active-color.description_zh: 文字和字体图标激活时的颜色

inactive-color.description: The color of the text and font icons when they are not activated
inactive-color.description_zh: 文字和字体图标未激活时的颜色

mid-button.description: If you configure this value, you still need to set the midButton of the raised item in the list parameter to true, as described above
mid-button.description_zh: 是否需要中部凸起的按钮，配置了此值，依然需要配置list参数中需凸起项的midButton为true，见上方说明

before-switch.description: The callback hook before the switch is described above
before-switch.description_zh: 切换之前的回调钩子，见上方说明

border-top.description: Whether to display the border at the top

hide-tab-bar.description: Whether to hide the native tabbar

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the option is toggled
